lines: 1. Ka Jabura nong`ad buchwa,E ngima kata e tho,Enokwanwa nade chieng`no,Jo maler koso joketh?
Opimi e rapim mar Ruoth,oyudi kirem;Opimi kuom weche mage,oyudi kirem.
2. Wanawinj weche kowacho,"Jatich maber, makare,"Koso enokwerwa chutho,"In Jaricho moloyo?"
3. Dak wawinj dwonde kosayo,"Donji e ng`wono mara."Koso wanabed kwadeko,nyaka bura nolowa?
